sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { persistDatbase, setSeesionIndex } from '../Features/DataSlice' const Nav = () => { const nav = useNavigate() const state: any = useSelector(state => state) const [name, setName] = useState('') const dispatch = useDispatch() //for userName useEffect(() => { if (state.sessionIndex !== -1) setName(state.users[state.sessionIndex].name) else setName('Guest user') }, [state.sessionIndex, state.users]) return (
nav('/')}>#JaiBlog
  • nav('/')}>Home
  • nav('/admin')}>Admin
  • {name}
  • {(state.sessionIndex == -1) ? nav('/login')}>Log in : { dispatch(setSeesionIndex(-1)); nav('/login') }}>Log Out}
) } export default Nav
